headline.main: ROOSEVELT GIVES WAR COUNCIL DATA; Pacific Body Gets Report on Relative Air Losses in the Battle of the Solomons JAPAN'S PLANS DISCUSSED Chinese Foreign Minister Says They Are Big Question Mark on Attack Upon Siberia

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 -- Members of the Pacific War Council discussed today the probabilities of an imminent Japanese attack upon Siberia, and heard from President Roosevelt an "encouraging" report on the relative airplane losses of American and Japanese forces in the Battle of the Solomon Islands.
abstract: Min T V Soong predicts Jap attack on USSR
